#summary DASe Atom Categories and Link Relations
#labels Featured

== Atom Categories ==

scheme prefix is: http://daseproject.org/category/

  * feedtype (collection | collection_list | search | item | tag)
  * entrytype (attribute | collection | item)
  * collection  (<collection_ascii_id>)
  * collection/item_count
  * item/serial_number 
  * item/status (public | draft | delete )
  * item/type
  * place_in_set
  * visibility (public | private)
  * public
  * private
  * tag/background (<color or hex code>)
  * tag/type (set | slideshow | cart | admin)
  * tag_item_id


==Atom Link relations ==

prefix is: http://daseproject.org/relation/

  * media-collection
  * feed-link
  * search-item
  * tag 
  * collection
  * collection/attributes
